name: Chase Kypher
description:
[DESCRIPTION...]

The year is 3043. Humanity has gone past previous technological limits and made almost everything fully automated. Robots are now intelligent and almost sentient. One service drone, Kypher, has stolen an experimental systems virus. It escaped The Facility and has threatened to break systems worldwide. The Facility has tasked you with capturing Kypher and retrieving the virus. The chase begins.

-

[INSTRUCTIONS...]

Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to control the robots' [directional movement].

    A -> Go Left        S -> Roll/Slide       D -> Go Right

-

Use the spacebar to [jump]. Press Twice to [Double Jump]

-

[POWER UPS...]

- INVINCIBLE POWER UP [BE INVINCIBLE FOR 5s]

 - COIN MAGNET POWERUP [MAGNETIZE COINS FOR 5s]

-

[HOW TO INSTALL...]

  • Install/Download the ZIP file below
  • Extract the ZIP file
  • Run 'Chase Kypher.exe'

-

[PAYMENT SCHEMES...]

Game Access Payment: [none]

Success Factor Payment: [none]

Extra Life: [optional]

Kypher Skins: [ingame currency]

Robot Skins: [ingame currency]

Ingame currency will be an optional purchase. Eventually, players can use the coins collected from the game to purchase skins for either Kypher or the Robot. Players will also be given the option to purchase the skins. The main source of income for the game will be ingame ad rewards, which will grant the players an extra life or power-up.

-
